quest.name: Home Comforts
journal: Gelen's house is somewhat breezier than usual.
objectives: Slay earth sprites and obtain their cores.
Deliver the earth sprite cores to Gelen.

dialogue.name: GELEN
dialogue.text: Would you mind givin' me a hand? I've not got long left. It's the least you could do.

dialogue.name: GELEN
dialogue.text: I've been livin' in this house ever since I got married. It was never in what I would call good nick, but it is mine. However, recently a huge crack appeared in the wall.

dialogue.name: GELEN
dialogue.text: I'd repair it myself, but I don't have the necessary materials. Do an old woman a favor and slay three earth sprites. You'll find some by the Ziggurat. Bring back their cores and we'll see if this house can't be fixed.

dialogue.name: GELEN
dialogue.text: Do an old woman a favor and slay three earth sprites. Bring back their cores and we'll see if this house can't be fixed.

dialogue.name: GELEN
dialogue.text: You best not have come back without those cores.

dialogue.name: GELEN
dialogue.text: Lovely! I'll get to work breakin' these up right away. Then I just need mix them into a paste that I can apply to the crack.

dialogue.name: GELEN
dialogue.text: That should stop it from reappearin' for a few years yet. With any luck, I won't even be around to see it crack again!

dialogue.name: GELEN
dialogue.text: Apparently the very ground we stand on used to be part of the quarry. Then, one day someone decided to start using it as a rest area. Eventually a house was built here─one thing led to another─and, before anyone knew it, a whole settlement had popped up.

dialogue.name: GELEN
dialogue.text: Anyway, that's enough stories for one day. Thank you, lasslad.
